mapper.insert: insert into deliveryreceipt (deliveryReceipt_id, start_city, end_city, mid_city, make_date, state, Comment) values (#{deliveryreceiptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{makeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update deliveryreceipt set start_city = #{startCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_city = #{endCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mid_city = #{midCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, make_date = #{makeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where deliveryReceipt_id = #{deliveryreceiptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select deliveryReceipt_id, start_city, end_city, mid_city, make_date, state, Comment from deliveryreceipt
